name: AMIA Flutter 103
description:
A Flutter project designed for the AMIA 2021 Clinical Informatics Conference that demos the use of styles, components, layouts, and prototypes in Figma.


Source code for the Flutter version of this app is available here. Note that the Flutter app also demos connections to healthcare data via Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (FHIR), which itself connects to Flutter using open-source FHIR-FLI packages.


For more information on FHIR-FLI, Flutter/Figma connections, and the resultant applicability to healthcare, check out our FlutterJuun YouTube channel or join our FHIR-FLI Slack channel.
